about_the_game:
Re:Legend - Echoes from Ethia Mini OST

# Track Title
1 Main Theme of Re:Legend
2 Lullaby
3 Homesteady
4 The Jovial Town!
5 Vokka Coast (Day ver.)
6 How Do YOU Do
7 The Good-Natured Shopkeeper - Theme of Emilia
8 Vokka Coast (Night ver.)
9 Remnants
10 The Magnus Barn
11 Memories of a Guardian
12 Under the Starry Sky

All tracks composed by Falk Au Yeong except Track 02 (Falk Au Yeong + DC Gan)
Arrangements:
Falk Au Yeong + Elmer Ho (Track 08)
Kevin Penkin (Track 09)

Orchestration:
Shota Nakama (Tracks 02 ~ 8, Tracks 11 ~ 12)
Zuzana Michlerová (Track 01)
Kevin Penkin (Track 09)

WGBH Fraser Studio Recording, BOSTON
Recording Engineer: Robin Moore
Recording Production Manager: Shota Nakama
Assistant Engineer: Matt Peiffer
Production Asssistant: Emily Shibata
Production Assistant: Maho Azuma
Videographer: Ernesto Galan

Mix One Studios, BOSTON
Recording Engineer: Matthew Peiffer
Recording Production Manager: Shota Nakama

PERFORMERS

Violins
Sumire Hirotsuru
Matheus Souza
Alexandra Labinska
Alina Psaros
Kelley McGarry
Kenneth Mok
Kiyoshi Hayashi
Matthew Vera
Peyton Cook

Horn

Trumpet

Trombone
Rick Copeland

Solo Recordings

Matheus Sardinha Garcia Souza, Sumire Hirotsuru
Flute
Burak Besir
Recorders
Burak Besir, Kristin Naigus
Irish Whistle
Burak Besir, Kristin Naigus
Oboe
Kristin Naigus
English Horn
Kristin Naigus
Clarinet
Kristin Naigus
Bassoon
Kristin Naigus
Piano
Tony Ann
Guitars
Shota Nakama



Special Thanks
Kevin Penkin
Hiromitsu Iijima
John Ashley Thomas
DC Gan
Welson Gan
Adrian Ng Hao Yik
Yuki "monolog" Kanesaka

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 760 2GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
